name: Root Runners: That time I had to connect all the tree's roots and avoid enemies
name_original: Root Runners: That time I had to connect all the tree's roots and avoid enemies
description:
Root Runners: That time I had to connect all the tree's roots and avoid enemies with either chainsaws or axeguns as a reincarnating sapling

In Root Runners you control a little sapling that grows a root behind it. When you die or decide to plant yourself down, you can regrow from any root you're connected to.

Your tree is dying, reach the cure tree to be safe and win the game!

Made for Global Gamejam 2023

MADE BY:

Thymo Boog - Epic bangers

Wietske Overtoom - Sick visual effects and BOS

Nyla Slot - Insane enemy code

Leon McCall - Crazy gameplay and movement code

Britta Amons - Adorable art all around

Ramon Huiskamp - I made the roots work and did level design
